# Dokument
```{r setup, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
vehicleStats <- read_tsv("freightOutput/freightVehicleStats.tsv") %>% mutate(travelDistance=travelDistance/1000)
tripStats <- read_tsv("freightOutput/freightVehicleTripStats.tsv")
serviceStats <- read_tsv("freightOutput/serviceStats.tsv")
shipmentStats <- read_tsv("freightOutput/shipmentStats.tsv")
```
## Comparison of VehicleTypes
electro vehicles unsurprisingly have a short range

```{r fig.cap ="travelDistance distribution of vehicle types", echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ggplot(data=vehicleStats, aes(travelDistance, color=VehicleType))+
  geom_density()+
  facet_wrap("VehicleType")
```
